data.message: Dear Slim, I wrote you but you still ain't calling, I left my cell, my pager, and my home phone at the bottom, I sent two letters back in autumn, you must not-a got 'em, There probably was a problem at the post office or something, Sometimes I scribble addresses too sloppy when I jot 'em, but anyways; fuck it, what's been up? Man how's your daughter? My girlfriend's pregnant, too, I'm bout to be a father, If I have a daughter, guess what I'ma call her?I'ma name her Bonnie
